ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We deal with evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is what We shall do to those who are guilty of crime.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus do We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus do We deal with the sinful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Even thus shall We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus deal We ever with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: thus do We deal with the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise We do with the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is how We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus do We deal with men of sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus do We deal with the Mujrimun (polytheists, disbelievers, sinners, criminals, etc.)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such shall We deal with the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is how We deal with the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:18] So, just as We dealt with those who denied, will We deal with the guilty, with every individual who will be guilty in the future, and destroy them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus deal We ever with the guilty) with the idolaters among your folk.
